subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tyler Zeller, a 7-foot senior at Washington (Ind.) High School, said he would play at North Carolina. He chose the Tar Heels over Indiana, Purdue and Notre Dame, where his 6-foot-10 brother, Luke, the 2005 Indiana high school Mr. Basketball, is a junior. Tyler Zeller cannot sign a letter of intent until Nov. 14, the first day of the N.C.A.A. fall signing period. Zeller averaged 18.3 points and 9.5 rebounds in leading the Hatchets to a 20-4 record last season.
